headline: IT Program Manager at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary:
Motivated, results-driven professional with over 8 years of technical & management experience of which the last 4 have been focused on system development life cycle and successful implementation of projects utilizing project management methodologies. Specific strengths include applying skills in technology policy and planning to manage the introduction, refresh, and retirement of technology products in the organization's IT infrastructure.  In addition, skilled in requirement analysis, managing project backlogs, overseeing the execution and acceptance of project deliverables, and utilizing project management best practices. 

Expert in delivering policy guidance to support approvals of technology acquisitions.  Experienced in the implementation of IT governance processes to facilitate successful delivery of technology products and services by multi-million dollar programs. An effective leader who promotes innovation, government policy, industry best practices, and lean processes to increase efficiencies and promote cost savings. Strong communication skills with 4 years of experience in organizing cross-functional teams towards the accomplishment of common objectives and critical deadlines within fast-paced, high-stress, and diverse environments. 

Earned a B.A. in Communications, Masters Certificate in Project Management, Project Management Professional (PMP)Â® certification, Certified Scrum Master, and ITILÂ® Foundations certified
